trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of all [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) elements in a project.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di tutti gli elementi [UsingTask](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20247902-9446-4a1f-8253-5c7a17e4fe43) in un progetto.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'intero oggetto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> compatibile unidimensionale, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> objects that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensionale di oggetti <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati da <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzazione di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve essere in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in <c>array</c> in corrispondenza del quale ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> objects, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Consente di copiare l'intero <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> in una classe <see cref="T:System.Array" /> compatibile unidimensionale di oggetti <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" />, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that is the destination of the elements copied from <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensionale che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dall'oggetto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: L'indicizzazione di <see cref="T:System.Array" /> deve essere in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in <c>array</c> in corrispondenza del quale ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> to a compatible one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'intero oggetto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Array" /> compatibile unidimensionale, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> objects in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica il numero di oggetti <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> nella classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che rappresenta il numero di oggetti <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask" /> nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> oggetto nella raccolta rappresenta un elemento del progetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un enumeratore che scorre la raccolta <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> for the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> per l'intera <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente al chiamante di usare il `foreach` istruzione del linguaggio c# (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) per scorrere i singoli <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTask> gli oggetti di <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'accesso a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" /> è sincronizzato (thread-safe); in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.UsingTaskCollection" />.
